description: I learned about this in my full-stack bootcamp! It really made it easier to navigate my repositories!
While this is the beginnings, there is so much more to website and database security.
Man, routers sure gave me trouble, but understanding CRUD and how the routes work with the server helps.
I think one could own a computer that they keep on all the time but conceed that it is probably impractical for an individual.
If only this was all we needed :/
SQL was giving me a lot of trouble until ORM showed me I could look at those tables like objects and everything clicked.
I love to utilize this concept with Sequelize and then I dont have to switch between SQL commands and JavaScript.
I love this concept as it made a lot of other smaller concepts that make up MVC instantly click for me. Such as how routes fit in with the server and the front end.
